p: To corroborate the TTO antimicrobial effectiveness, its synergistic activity was also investigated in combination with sub-inhibitory concentrations of traditional antimicrobials commonly used as a part of combination treatment against MDR Gram-negatives [ 25]. Among used antimicrobial MEM (to which all the CR strains were resistant) and COL (to which both CS and CR-Kp were resistant) a synergism was shown with all tested combinations, with FICI values lower than 0.5.
